exports.name: NextFunction
exports.description: Function called by middleware to advance to the next handler. Returns void or a Promise.

exports.name: MiddlewareContext
exports.description: Shape of the context object passed to each middleware, including path, method, headers, optional body, and mutable state.

exports.name: MiddlewareFn
exports.description: Signature for middleware functions: accepts a MiddlewareContext and NextFunction, may be async.

exports.name: PipelineOptions
exports.description: Configuration options for MiddlewarePipeline instances (timeoutMs, onError callback).

exports.name: MiddlewarePipeline
exports.description: Class that manages a stack of middleware functions; supports adding, executing, counting, clearing, and branching.
